SEARCH
Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.user

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.user.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements IUserService
Service layer for handling user-related operations. Provides functionality for registering, updating, retrieving, and managing user data, including roles, appointments, and reviews.

    • register

      public User register(RegistrationRequest request)
      Registers a new user based on the provided registration request. Validates the request and generates a verification token for the user.
      Specified by:
      register in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      request - the registration request containing user details.
      Returns:
      the registered User.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update.

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(Long userId)
      Deletes a user by their ID. Also deletes all related reviews and appointments.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to delete.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • validateRegistrationRequest

      private void validateRegistrationRequest(RegistrationRequest request)
      Validates the registration request to ensure all required fields are valid. Formats the first name and last name to have proper capitalization.
      Parameters:
      request - the RegistrationRequest containing user details for registration.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any field in the request is invalid.

    • validateUserUpdateRequest

      private void validateUserUpdateRequest(UserUpdateRequest request)
      Validates the user update request to ensure all required fields are valid. Formats the first name and last name to have proper capitalization.
      Parameters:
      request - the UserUpdateRequest containing updated user details.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any field in the request is invalid.

    • aggregateUsersByMonthAndType

      public Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByMonthAndType()
      Aggregates the count of users by their creation month and user type.
      Specified by:
      aggregateUsersByMonthAndType in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      a nested map where the key is the month, the value is another map where the key is the user type and the value is the count of users.

    • aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType

      public Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType()
      Aggregates the count of users by their enabled status and user type.
      Specified by:
      aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      a nested map where the key is the enabled status ("Enabled" or "Non-Enabled"), and the value is another map where the key is the user type and the value is the count of users.

    • lockUserAccount

      public void lockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Locks the user's account by disabling their access.
      Specified by:
      lockUserAccount in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be locked.

    • unLockUserAccount

      public void unLockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Unlocks the user's account by enabling their access.
      Specified by:
      unLockUserAccount in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be unlocked.

    • getPhotoByUserId

      public byte[] getPhotoByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves the photo data for a given user's photo by user ID.
      Specified by:
      getPhotoByUserId in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose photo data will be fetched.
      Returns:
      a byte array containing the photo data, or null if no photo exists.
